Description: Electrical Power Design Drawing Set - single line diagrams MV/LV distribution cable schedules grounding drawings (~25 drawings)
Notes: Allowance for electrical power drawing production; includes SLDs distribution layouts cable schedules grounding plans - typical electrical package complexity

Description: Electrical Power Technical Specification - specification writing (transformer switchgear MCC cable grounding specs)
Notes: Allowance for electrical specification writing; includes transformer spec switchgear spec MCC spec cable spec grounding spec

Description: Electrical Power Design Calculations - load calculations short circuit protection coordination voltage drop analysis
Notes: Allowance for electrical calculations; includes load flow short circuit coordination studies voltage drop cable sizing - requires P.Eng. stamp

Description: Electrical Power Data Sheet Package - equipment data sheets (transformer MCC switchgear UPS panels)
Notes: Allowance for electrical data sheet compilation; includes transformer datasheets MCC datasheets switchgear datasheets UPS datasheet

Description: Electrical Power Installation & Test Records - QA/QC documentation setup and record preparation (insulation tests relay tests FAT records)
Notes: Allowance for QA/QC documentation templates and record closeout for electrical installation and testing

Description: MV/LV Transformers - pad-mounted transformers (assume 2 units 1000-1500 kVA each) with protection and auxiliaries
Notes: Placeholder for transformer supply; actual size depends on load calculations - assumes 2 transformers for redundancy/load distribution

Description: MV Switchgear - medium voltage metal-clad switchgear lineup (assume 5-bay lineup with main breaker and feeders)
Notes: Placeholder for MV switchgear; includes main incoming breaker transformer feeders metering and protection relays - marine/industrial rated

Description: LV Switchgear - low voltage switchboard/panelboard lineup (assume main-tie-main configuration)
Notes: Placeholder for LV switchgear; includes main breakers bus ties distribution feeders - rated for industrial duty

Description: Motor Control Centers (MCCs) - MCCs for pump motors and process equipment (assume 3 MCCs total - railcar area tank farm marine area)
Notes: Placeholder for MCC supply; assumes 3 MCCs distributed across facility areas - each MCC sized for local motor loads with VFDs where required

Description: Distribution Panels and Subpanels - local distribution panels for lighting receptacles small power (assume 8 panels)
Notes: Placeholder for distribution panel supply; includes panels for MCC building operator shelters field locations

Description: UPS System - uninterruptible power supply for control systems and critical loads (assume 10 kVA unit)
Notes: Placeholder for UPS system; sized for control system DCS HMI and critical instrumentation loads

Description: Grounding Materials - ground grid electrodes bonding conductors exothermic welds test wells (assume 1200m ground conductor 15 electrodes)
Notes: Placeholder for grounding system materials; includes ground grid buried conductors driven electrodes bonding to structures/equipment/tanks

Description: MV Power Cable - medium voltage power cable 5kV-15kV (assume 800m total MV cable runs transformer feeders)
Notes: Placeholder for MV cable; actual length depends on equipment layout and routing - assumes shielded EPR/XLPE cable rated 5-15kV

Description: LV Power Cable - low voltage power cable 600V (assume 3500m total LV feeder and branch cable)
Notes: Placeholder for LV cable; includes feeder cables to MCCs panels and equipment - assumes TECK90 or equivalent 600V rated cable

Description: Control Cable - control and instrumentation cable 600V (assume 2500m for motor controls I/O signals)
Notes: Placeholder for control cable; multi-conductor shielded cable for motor control circuits and I/O signals to field devices

Description: Cable Tray and Ladder Rack - galvanized cable tray with fittings and supports (assume 900m total tray)
Notes: Placeholder for cable tray system; includes tray ladder rack fittings hangers supports - marine-environment galvanized or stainless where exposed

Description: Conduit and Fittings - PVC and rigid conduit for underground/embedded/local routing (assume 600m total conduit)
Notes: Placeholder for conduit system; includes underground duct banks rigid conduit for equipment connections PVC for concrete embedment

Description: Electrical Installation Materials - termination hardware wire ferrules labels panel accessories miscellaneous
Notes: Placeholder for installation materials; includes lugs ferrules labels wire markers junction boxes pull boxes grounding hardware

Description: Freight and Logistics - electrical equipment transport delivery coordination receiving (transformers switchgear MCCs)
Notes: Placeholder for freight; includes transport of major electrical equipment from suppliers to site - transformers and switchgear require specialized rigging

Description: Transformer Installation - rigging setting pad mounting grounding terminations testing (2 transformers)
Notes: Placeholder for transformer installation; includes crane rigging pad mounting HV/LV terminations grounding connections insulation/turns-ratio testing

Description: MV Switchgear Installation - rigging setting bus connections terminations protection relay programming testing
Notes: Placeholder for MV switchgear installation; includes rigging setting bus work terminations relay settings hipot testing functional testing

Description: LV Switchgear Installation - rigging setting bus connections terminations testing (main-tie-main configuration)
Notes: Placeholder for LV switchgear installation; includes setting terminations testing - less complex than MV switchgear

Description: MCC Installation and Terminations - MCC setting motor feeder terminations VFD programming testing (3 MCCs distributed areas)
Notes: Placeholder for MCC installation; includes setting motor circuit terminations VFD setup testing - 3 MCCs across railcar tank farm marine areas

Description: Distribution Panel Installation - panel mounting terminations circuit testing labeling (8 panels)
Notes: Placeholder for panel installation; includes mounting feeder/branch terminations circuit testing labeling

Description: UPS Installation and Testing - UPS setting battery installation programming load testing
Notes: Placeholder for UPS installation; includes setting battery installation programming load bank testing acceptance testing

Description: Grounding System Installation - ground grid installation electrode driving bonding exothermic welding testing
Notes: Placeholder for grounding installation; includes trenching grid conductor installation driven electrodes exothermic welds bonds to structures/equipment soil resistance testing

Description: Cable Tray and Conduit Installation - tray installation supports conduit installation underground duct bank installation
Notes: Placeholder for cable support installation; includes tray installation hangers supports conduit bending/threading underground duct bank trenching/bedding/backfill

Description: Cable Pulling and Termination - cable pulling terminations testing labeling (MV LV control cables ~6800m total)
Notes: Placeholder for cable installation; includes pulling/training terminations at both ends megger testing hipot testing (MV) labeling - significant labor content

Description: Electrical Testing and Commissioning Support - insulation testing continuity relay functional testing loop checks coordination with commissioning
Notes: Placeholder for electrical testing; includes final insulation testing protection relay testing continuity checks pre-commissioning support

Description: Construction Indirects - field supervision electrical safety QA/QC coordination (factor-based)
Notes: 18% of CD base ($1
column15: 049.5k CD x 0.18 = $188.9k); factor from fallback model per D-1708

Description: EPCM / Project Management - PKG-17 allocation electrical engineering coordination (factor-based)
Notes: 6% of (CD+CI+MAT+FRT) = 6% x ($1
column16: 989.5k + $58k) = $197.2k; factor from fallback model per D-1708

Description: Procurement Services - electrical equipment vendor coordination expediting inspection FAT witness (factor-based)
Notes: 2% of (MAT+FRT) = 2% x ($1
column15: 989.5k + $58k) = $41.0k; factor from fallback model per D-1708

Description: Electrical Systems Commissioning - protection relay functional testing integrated systems testing energization support acceptance
Notes: 3% of (CD+CI+MAT) = 3% x ($1
column16: 989.5k) = $96.8k; factor from fallback model per D-1708
